name: Exakis
description:
Exakis has been developing an exclusive partnership with Microsoft for 15 years while simultaneously accompanying its customers in their transformation towards the Cloud.
With its 6 agencies and 300 consultants, Exakis is the partner of the DSI and the Trades to build intelligent Cloud platforms, encourage collaboration, promote mobility and innovation.Our challenge is to meet the challenges of ISD:
modernize obsolete applications,
reduce the cost of the information system,
unify user and device management, and
develop and integrate business applications more quickly while protecting company data.
Our challenge is to meet the challenges of ISD. Exakis develops solutions based on these technologies with a programmatic approach: delays, sustainability and cost optimization. Innovation is the driving force behind our creativity.
Our ambition is to improve the performance of your company by crossing your stakes and the richness of the catalog of Microsoft solutions.
